title: Hydrogen-bonded organic frameworks for membrane separation
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,2738-2760
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00866E, Review Article
Cheng Chen, Liguo Shen, Hongjun Lin, Dieling Zhao, Bisheng Li, Banglin Chen
This review provides a comprehensive overview of the fabrication strategies and applications of hydrogen-bonded organic frameworks in membrane separation.
